146639.「ふむふむ……。\n 今 <pc>さんには\n 調査を お願いしていませんでした:
Hmmm... now I didn't ask to do a survey. First of all, please choose which area of the monster you would like to start
researching from the "Accept Survey Request" page!

147082.「調査内容を 変更しないのですね。\n わかりましたっ！<br>\n「今の調査状:
You are not going to change the survey? I understand! You can check the current status of the survey from the Realm Survey Binder
under Key Items, so please come back when the survey is complete!

147083.「わかりました……。\n <pc>さんも お忙しいでしょうし\n こればっかりは:
I understand... You must be pretty busy yourself, then...
But! If you just so happen to change your mind and feel like investigating some monsters, you're always welcome to come back!

147086.「まあっ 調査内容を変更したいのですねっ！\n 変更しちゃうと 今の調査は中止と:
Well now! So you'd like to change the area you're investigating? Your current survey's progress will be reset to 0 if you do that.
That being said, are you okay cancelling your current investigation and changing to a different one?

147089.<pipipi_on>\n「依頼中の魔物の調査状況は\n だいじなものにある 領:
You can check the progress of your current investigation by using the Realm Survey Binder in your Key Items.
When you've finished investigating the monsters in an area, come back and see me for a reward! Good luck!

147092.「ありがとうございますっ！\n 魔物の調査を 始めていただけるのですね。\n ま:
Thanks so much! To begin your investigation
on monsters, you'll have to first choose the
realm you want to investigate.
<break>

147093.「わかりましたっ！\n 調査内容を 変更しますね。それでは……\n 新たに調査を:
So you want to change, got it! Now...can you
please choose the new realm you'd like to
investigate?
<break>

147095.<pipipi_off>\n<%sM_ryoukai> <%sM_stage>の:
<pipipi_off>Received a request to investigate
<%sM_stage> in the
<%sM_ryoukai>!
<me 74><end>

147096.「他になにか ご用件はありますか？\n<break>:
Anything else I can do for you?
<break>

147097.「ふむふむ……。<pc>さんが\n 今 調査中の依頼は こちらでしたね。\n な:
Hmmm... I see that <pc> is currently
investigating this request. Can I help you?
<break>

147098.「<pc>さんが\n 今 調査中の依頼は こちらでしたね。\n 他になにか ご用:
I see that <pc> is currently
investigating this request. Is there anything
else we can help you with?
<break>

147102.「つづいて 調査を行う地域を\n 選んでください。\n<break>:
Please choose the area you'd like to
investigate.
<break>

147103.「……あらっ？ <%sM_stage>は\n 今 調査中の地域です。調査内容を変:
...oh? <%sM_stage> is the region you are
currently surveying. If you want to change the
survey, please select another region.
<break>

147104.「……あらっ？ <%sM_stage>は\n すでに 調査が完了していますね。<:
...oh? I see that <%sM_stage> has already been surveyed. We've been asked by HQ to average out the monster survey... sorry, but you'll
have to choose from the areas that haven't been completed yet.

147105.「ふむふむ……今回の魔物調査は\n <%sM_ryoukai>の <%sM_st:
Hmmm...this time the MONSTER survey is
<%sM_stage> of <%sM_ryoukai>. So, may we begin
the survey?
<yesno 2><close>

147150.「調査には いくつかルールがあります。\n まず 魔物調査は 一度につき\n ひ:
There are a few rules about surveys. First, you can only do one monster survey in one area at a time. To survey another area, you must
either talk to me and select "Change Survey" or complete the survey you are currently working on. Also, once you have completed a
survey, you will not be able to re-survey the same area until all other areas within the same territory have been surveyed. I've said
all this and more, but I'm sure you'll figure it out as soon as you try it, so please take it easy and make your choice!

147151.「<pc>さんが 進行中の調査をやめて\n 他の地域の 調査をしたくなったら 私:
If you want to stop the survey in progress and start a survey in another area, please talk to me and select "Change
Survey". However... if you change the survey area, the current survey will be cancelled and the number of monsters killed will go back to
0. If you still want to do so, you can change the survey at any time. Please be assured that the information on the completed survey areas
will not disappear even if you change the survey content. ...However, the actual surveyor will decide which area
to survey first! So if you want to change your mind, please feel free to consult with us.

147152.「魔物の調査……指定の魔物を\n すべて倒し終わったら 領界調査バインダーを\n:
Monster Survey...When you have killed all the designated monsters, please bring the Realm Survey Binder to me. After checking the
contents, send the information to the headquarters to complete. You will receive a reward for each completed survey. Rewards will
be in the form of experience and gold, so it is recommended that you report in the vocation where you want to receive the rewards. Of
course, you can also receive training stamps instead of experience, so please think carefully before reporting. In addition! If
you have completed the survey of all the regions in the same territory...what? In addition to the rewards for each region, you
will also receive a special reward from me! Aim for it! Complete the survey of the whole area! I'm going to complete the survey of the
entire area! Even after you complete the survey, you can receive the rewards as many times as you want if you survey the area
again. You can check what you can get from Key Items if you talk to me or if you are taking orders, so please do your best!

147153.「魔物の調査を始めるには 私に話して\n 『調査依頼を受ける』を選んでください。:
To start a survey for monster, please talk to me and select the "Accept Survey Request" option. The survey will be done by region, so
should choose one region you would like to survey and tell me about it. I will take care of the details, so all you have
to do is defeat the specified number of monsters. When you have finished defeating all the designated monsters, please come to me,
check the Realm Survey Binder, send the information to the headquarters, and the survey will be completed! I will give you your
reward at that time.

147154.「魔物の調査……指定の魔物を\n すべて倒し終わったら 領界調査バインダーを\n:
Monster Survey...When you have killed all the designated monsters, please bring the Realm Survey Binder to me. After checking the
contents, send the information to the headquarters to complete. You will receive a reward for each completed survey. Rewards will
be in the form of experience and gold, so it is recommended that you report in the vocation where you want to receive the rewards. Of
course, you can also receive training stamps instead of experience, so please think carefully before reporting. In addition! If
you have completed the survey of all the regions in the same territory...what? In addition to the rewards for each region, you
will also receive a special reward from me! Aim for it! Complete the survey of the whole area! I'm going to complete the survey of the
entire area! Even after you complete the survey, you can receive the rewards as many times as you want if you survey the area
again. You can check what you can get from Key Items if you talk to me or if you are taking orders, so please do your best!

148454.<pipipi_off>\n受注していた 調査依頼は 完了している。\n聖都エジ:
<pipipi_off>
I've completed the investigation request I was
given and will report to Realm Detective
Mofteka in Holy City Ejarna.
<end>

149528.「調査対象となる領界ですが\n 本部の都合で 対象を\n 増やさせていただくこと:
The number of territories to be surveyed may be increased due to circumstances at our headquarters. I think it will probably be
after the new territory is connected and the safety of the entire area is confirmed, but I don't know the details... sorry. I'm sorry! In
that case, I think it would be better for to proceed with his own adventure! I'm sorry, but if there are more
territories that can be surveyed, I'll let you know when you come to me.

204353.「調律の内容を 変更しないんだね。\n それでは引き続き よろしく頼む。\n<b:

204354.「わかったよ <pc>。\n 君も忙しいだろうし こればっかりは\n 仕方がない:

204357.「調律内容を変更したいんだね。\n 変更すると 今の調律は中止となり\n 魔物の:

204372.「調律には いくつかルールがある。\n まず 調律は 一度につき\n ひとつの地:
There are a few rules to tuning. First, you can only tune one area at a time. To tune another region, you must either talk to me and
select "Change Tuning" or complete the tuning you are currently working on. Also, once a region has been tuned, it cannot be re-tuned
until all regions of the same period have been tuned. I know I've said a lot of things, but you'll see what I mean. Take it easy and give
it a try.

204373.「君が 進行中の調律をやめて\n 他の地域の 調律をしたくなったら 私に話して\:
If you want to stop the tuning in progress and tune another area, please talk to me and select "Change Tuning". However... if you
change the tuning area, the current tuning will be canceled and the number of monsters killed will go back to 0. If you still want,
you can change the tuning at any time. Please be assured that the information of the tuned area will not disappear even if the tuning is
changed. ...However, it is up to the who actually performs the tuning to decide which region to tune. So, if
you want to change the tuning, please feel free to consult with him.

204375.「調律対象となる 時代だが\n 調律者である 君自身の冒険が 進むほどに\n 増:
The times you are tuned into will only increase as your own adventures as a tuner progress. The Tuning Binder will respond to
your perceptions and begin to correct the order of the world. I apologize for the inconvenience, but I'll let you know when you
come to me for more tuning times.

204376.「世界の調律を始めるには 私に話して\n 『調律依頼を受ける』を選んでほしい。\:
To start tuning the world, please talk to me and select the "Tuning Request" option. Tuning is done by region, so will
choose one region to tune and tell me about it. All has to do is defeat a specified number of monsters. When you have
killed all the monsters, come to me and check the Tuning Binder to see if your tuning is complete. I'll give you your reward then.

204377.「魔物の調律……指定の魔物を\n すべて倒し終わったら 調律バインダーを\n 私:
Tuning monsters...When you have finished defeating all the designated monsters, please bring the Tuning Binder to me. After
confirming the contents, you can complete the tuning. I will give you a reward for each completed tuning of an area. The reward will
be experience or gold, so it is recommended that you report in the vocation where you want to receive the reward. Of course, you can also
receive training stamps instead of experience, so think carefully before reporting. In addition, if you have completed all the
tunings in the same period, you will receive a special reward in addition to the rewards for each region. Please aim to complete the tuning
of the entire period. After you have completed the tuning, I will reward you for tuning again as many times as you wish. You can find out
what you can get by talking to me or by checking the Key Items if you are taking orders.

204380.「ありがとう <pc>。\n 調律を 始めてくれるんだね。\n どの時代を調律す:
Thanks <pc>. I see you are starting
the tuning. You may choose which period you
want to tune.
